content: Works like a charm. Can message everyone in the house as advertised!

This app used to be great. Since installing a home wifi mesh a few weeks ago, it never finds all my speakers. It seems totally random as to which it finds and when. Sometimes (like just now) it found none, sometimes just one or two. Very annoying.

App constantly disables on its own! This is a problem as it is not reliable. When we want it to respond the ring doorbell for example, nothing happens. And to find out that it has auto disabled (like a timeout), is very, very frustrating.

The app itself is good. I use it as broadcast to my kids. What i think is not is being able to purchase one copy for family use. I paid for mine but wife cant use it otherwise it would be a 5 star. Its not an app we use often so not worth paying for multiple subs. Pushed it up one more star for the upcoming ability to get a family plan upgrade. Will review the new plan soon
Seems to work OK, but at virtually 5 UK pounds that does seem a bit steep for what it is - even if it is a one-off payment... also, phone reports high battery use. Uninstalling.
Oldisch & did crash on several occasions.
Doesn't work

Two sonos speakers on our network, and the app says it can't find any speakers on our network. I was excited to use this, but I guess it was too good to be true that I actually stumbled upon this app.
Why would I need to pay just to announce things in my house. $8 what a rip
Phone diagnostics report app overloading CPU & causing excessive battery drain for something that has only been used once as a test. Bit pointless really. Uninstalled.

Can be temperamental and not connect to WiFi: "sign in failed". No menu or settings place to try to fix this yourself other than uninstalling and reinstalling. Customer service is pretty reactive though although still not sure whether the issue will reappear which would be very annoying... When it works (that's most of the time) it does what is intended which is to broadcast messages through WiFi to the Sonos speakers. May be annoying for the recipients but this is part of the fun 😉
Not at all clear how to use with either sonos or spotify. Useless.
"Could not sign in, check internet connection" I have internet, but the app doesn't start. Shame - SONOFY looks good, based on store description.
Love it! It's a really handy app to have! The "Phone Home" feature is awesome 😁 Is it possible to do it to all speakers or just some of them?
It works. But I was surprised that I had to "fill up" after sending a few messages. I don't even know if that costs money. After I was limited, I uninstalled.
Great for sending voice messages to our speaker. I've just placed my breakfast order from bed! 😂
Good

Works... but I don't care for the price to keep using it. Edit: Quick response (I like that) and I was confused so I raised my rating and changed the review... but still not worth it to me... but that's just me. If you need intercom like functions via Sonos this seems to fit the bill.
Lol. Pay to send messages to my own speaker? Really?
Works well
Easy to install and use. Now i have a whole home intercom! Developer worked through an issue quickly and on the weekend no less! Wow, never experienced such care.
Still no fix for Huawei owners. :(. My Phone is Huawei P10 plus. This is now fixed
Good app. Good reactivity from developer.

wow. solving first world problems 🎩!! I was about to blow 2k on a whole house intercom system since my wife and I were tired of yelling at the top of our lungs for the kids across the house. we already had 10 sonos speakers on Sonos Net, and now for 5 bucks I'm good to go with an excuse to buy more sonos speakers and still come out ahead. super convenient swipe down to type and announce. also a widget to record voice. brilliant!!!
Why would i have to sign in to my Google account to use this app? No thanks. No option to just log into my Sonos? I try to keep my Google account private.

I use the App primary with my Ring Doorbell. Everytime someone rings a user-defined message is broadcasted over the pre-determined Sonos Devices. Also works for Whatsapp, SMS, Calls. You can even broadcast you own message(typed or recorded). Example: you have dreadful kids (like i do) playing in the living room while you are on the 1st floor. You can now scream at them over your Sonos! Beware: if you pay for the lifetime plan you don't get a Gift basket! No matter how sweet you ask. 1A Support!

By far the fastest responding support team. reported an issue and was fixed instantly. the app is nice and easy to use with lots of potential. the notifications on my speakers for incoming messages is pretty cool.
great app until last update which keeps telling me to connect to wi-fi even tho I am connected
Works great in sending urgent messages to kids and others in the household without having to go to them or scream loudly.
Fantastic app and developers. They in less than 8 hrs fixed the build so that it ran on Android P DP2.
Extremely well made and easy to use notification/intercom app for Sonos. Works great when having to communicate with people in other rooms
Its really fun to use and its helpful but you only have a certain amount of times you can use the intercom. I havnt used it that many times but when u do, do you have buy more.
This has serious potential to displace the entire SONOS media center application. Why waste time on a simple broadcast app?
HATED IT SO MUCH!!!!
Freaking awesome! We love this app! Kids love it too. Fun for practical uses like time for dinner. Also nice for jokes too. One of the funnest apps we've ever used.
Fantastic app, well designed and easy to use. Working great on Play5.

Seemed to work OK on my Sony xz2, but when I installed it on samsung s8 it 
did not work, could not see calls as an option to announce. I got three 
blank buttons on list instead. Weird!
@ Jamie Dale: and...? Was he at the door? ;)

Love this app. Had the children think santa was listening at christmas. Was 
a life saver
Doesnt load on s7 egde. Waste of time!!

Uninstalled the app, one time purchase would be fine. Won't pay for the 
number of broadcasts.

Been using this app since early beta and I must say that it stayed stable 
since. Now, when the app is publicly available it's polished, simple to use 
and does exactly what it is supposed to do without useless features or ads. 
Good job!

Love the Sonos speakers, and with this app, I am able to really take 
advantage of all their features. Thank You!

[Edit] Thanks for the quick and professional feedback Eric. I'm happy to report that notifications are working great now. Terrific customer service and a very useful app  The broadcasting feature works really nicely but notifications aren't  working at all (eg. Calendar notifications don't come through, despite them  coming up on my phone)

Love the app, it has made my life so much easier. Being able to send these 
notifications around my house by Sonos is really helpful. 😀

Doesn't carry on playing music after announcement and I have to restart 
Sonos. Sent feedback but no reply.

This is exactly what I was looking for. You can put a widget on your home 
screen to broadcast an announcement to your Sonos using either your voice 
or by typing a message.
I think that it is so cool that we can finally talk trough sonos. and i love the text to voice thing too.
If you have Sonos, you must add Sonofy to your you're experience.
I think this is the best app on the market for using the full potential of your system. This group really listens to user feedback and implements changes and updates quickly. LOVE IT!

Been waiting for an app like this since forever on Android and it's super 
useful for a family. Great app!
This is a great app that has worked flawlessly
Amazing!!! Get around it :)

I really like this app and it's made our Sonos system part of the daily 
planning and organisation. It's especially good for setting reminders 
(often multiples) to get the kids out of the door. I'd like to see some 
updates including voice options and preset messages used frequently, but 
getting a stable service has been a priority. Much improved over time 
already.
Awesome, finally something new

This app is great. It's great for fun and for actually using Sonos to talk 
with people in the house. Would recommend. Very well executed app.
Love this app!
This is a great app for using your sonos system as an in-home intercom. It's easy to use and the kids get a big kick out of hearing our voices come over the speakers.

I didn't know this was a possibility until I found this app.  I was looking for something to send announcements from my phone to my Sonos system.   And this app does exactly that.  PLUS a whole lot more.  Phone alerts for texts, calendar events, etc.  Plus alerts from many other apps.    It's a very good way to bridge the gap between house and speaker.  BIG fan.

Fantastic companion app for sonos, being able to use it as an intercom and 
announcements. A bit of fun with some use to it too!

This app is a must have for families. Turns my Sonos into a Whole House 
Intercom System. The Notification feature is a great feature to never miss 
a Text or a Skype message. Love the Do Not Disturb and Voice Notification 
features for customization. Well Done.
Been using this app for a while now. Brilliant fully recommend.

This app is amazing to use for the Sonos speakers while networked together 
to broadcast announcements to one or all speakers. We utilize this app all 
the time.
Works pretty well and great fun when you have visitors! Apart from that surprisingly useful.

The app notification and the broadcast feature is why I downloaded the app.  It works flawlessly and it helps me communicate with my family easily and keeps me from having to check my phone for certain notifications.
I have smart home and Sonos set up thru out I love the intercom the best, works great
What a great app!  Really adds value and connects my phone to my home.  Definitely recommend.
Love the app. Very useful and I use it every day!
Excellent app, easy to configure and does what it says on the tin. why sonos  does have this already, i don;t know but this app fills the gap  Tim

This app is great. I love creating automated messages over my home stereo 
through sonos. It is also really cool that since I have it setup to read my 
texts about. Great app would recommend to sonos owners.

Awesome is the only way to explain it. Could use some tweaks. But still 
deserves 5 stars

Great app for the family. Easy enough for my 9 year old to use to tell her 
brother to turn his music down!

Easiest intercom app for SONOS speakers. Just took less than a minute to 
download the app, open it, and send an intercom message to the speaker 
across the house!

This is the best intercom app for Sonos, hands down. I do wish it were real  time rather than a recording, but it's still quite useful.  I use it to call my husband down for breakfast.  I like that I can record my own voice, or use text2talk.  Would definitely recommend.
Great app to broadcast through Sonos!

This is a very useful app for a smart home enthusiast interested in getting 
their notifications beamed throughout their house. There is a slight delay 
in transmitting messages to the Sonos system but that is to be expected 
considering the usual latency in Sonos systems.
Husband has it and uses it to scare the kids!
Very cool extension of the Sonos system

I primarily use it as a house-wide intercom to get to the kids, for which 
it works well. I haven't used the message features.

As a thank you for testing the app, I now am asked to pay to use it. No 
thanks.
I had wanted a way to broadcast to my kiddos, this is great!
If you have a sonos and have children this is a no brainer! Get it today
The broadcast feature is great. Works a treat.

Brilliant app, adds so much to Sonos. Great for notifications around the 
House e.g. dinner is ready etc (you can even direct it to individual rooms 
e.g. hope you have done your homework before you are playing on that 
PlayStation) So many things you can use it for, one great example (which I 
have told many customers about) if you have a security/fire system or 
elderly care system that can send SMS messages you can sent it up to wake 
and alert you to emergency situations. Also great fun to play messages when 
friends walk through the door Great app, if you haven't downloaded it 
already, why not? Highly recommended! ***UPDATE*** Support is amazing, 
replied within 2 minutes and very helpful! I would especially like to 
single out eric as replied to every message very politely and answered 
questions perfectly Keep up the good work

I use this all the time to summon the kids. We also play a modified hide 
and seek using voice cues broadcast through the app.

Great app, worth it purely for the broadcast facility which I used 
frequently at home (kids!) and in the office. Once you start using this 
you'll know that paying for them is worth it - take the leap of faith.

If you have SONOS you'll love this app! Has already surpassed my 
expectations in so many ways!!!!

Used Sonofy in beta, elated they changed the name back to Sonofy! I often leave my phone silent and charging on another floor of my home, Sonofy has allowed me to not miss those important phone calls!
Don't use it a ton, but it's a great tool when you need it!
Great features for SONOS owners! The beta didn't work as expected, but the latest update works well!

App has never worked (in beta), crashed every time you tried to broadcast 
(Pixel XL) and now they expect you to pay money before you can even see if 
they fixed it? Starting to feel like a scam to me
Great app that saves me shouting for the kids!

This app adds great functionality to the Sonos system! The app is built 
well and is easy and intuitive to use.

This App does what the Sonos app should already have: the option to use as 
an intercom. I think that this App is amazing!
Genius. Every family with Sonos needs this.

Worked only a couple of times when I first installed. Stopped working. Only 
Broadcast works. No alerts working for texts. Takes a lot of battery.

Awesome. I can call a kitchen meeting anytime. Saves my poor old vocal 
cords 😄
This is a perfect implementation of a great idea. Totally loved it
Just what I was looking for. Works really well

Fun app. Gives a new use for your Sonos speakers! Must have for all Sonos 
owners

V good so far. I have a mini PA system in home now. Practical and fun at 
the same time.

An incredible app which for a family like ours, has doubled the value of 
our Sonos speakers. A must have system for giving our kids notice that they 
need to start thinking about the next part of the day. Or to surprise my 2 
year old that I'm about to walk into the home after work - both utility and 
fun!
Great for getting the boys out of bed!

It's the best Sonos broadcasting app I have ever used! It is a functional 
tool as well as a lot of fun to send messages to your kids! All the testing 
I have been doing and it's been flawless! Good job guys! Thank you!

Useful app with a lot of options. I mainly use it for the broadcast feature 
which is great.
Great fun to communicate with
Great app for home automation enthusiasts. Fills a gap that Sonos can't!

Really useful to get the kids to come out if their rooms when they have 
their music playing and 'couldn't hear us calling'....
Really extends the use of my Sonos system

Really happy that's it's out of beta now. I use it everyday with my Sonos 
system and it is the best Sonos control app that I have tried. 5 stars
This is a really great app that is extremely useful.
Brilliant app best 3rd party for sonos
The best app for my sonos. Very convenient and easy to use.
Superb app and love the ability to broadcast messages.
No trial period.

This app i's back hello yeah ! Love this app from day one loves the 
intercom feature

Love being able to broadcast messages like "dinners ready" or ask for 
things in other parts of the house. App is simple to use

This app has helped me a few times with its announcements, especially when I've locked myself out of the house with no keys and no one has their phones on them. They can't ignore an announcement throughout the house asking to let me in... The app has very secretive development and keeps improving!
Really useful app and takes the sonos system to the next level!
Great but doesn't always work

This is one of the must have apps to amplify the features of Sonos. Thanks 
to the team for getting this out of beta and fixing all issues.

This app is great for my office. I have 15 speakers around the warehouse. 
It allows my company to page each individual lication.
Absolutely fantastic app.
Love the intercom feature with my Sonos speakers! And I can leave my phone in one room and get call and text notifications thru my Sonos speakers everywhere.

Love it! Keeps me from having to yell at my kids to come down for dinner. 
It's the perfect addition to my Sonos system. It's like having an intercom 
system in my house. Great work Sonofy team!

Awesome product - I really like the integration and flexibility of where I 
get notifications and which I get.
Great app used it in beta!!!!

Sonofy fills a need for non-rooted devices to be able to broadcast using a 
system people paid good money for. Some quircky delays and little bugs 
prevented me from giving it a full 5, but the developers are attentive and 
the product is getting better with time.

To be clear, I have not used all of the available tools in this app. The 
Sonos intercom, though, is worth it all by itself. I was going to list all 
the stuff we do with it, but honestly, it's yelling at the kids. Be quiet, 
come to dinner, go do your reading for school, bring me a soda...truly, it 
has revolutionized the laziness with which we parent.
Super easy to use and very convenient.  Super functional and adds a great missing feature to your Sonos.

OMG! This app is awesome. I can get notifications wherever I'm at and I 
don't need my phone in the same room that I'm in. I've missed important 
messages because of this and now I won't !

Great idea, but most importantly, well-executed and beautifully designed. 
Works well and adds tremendous additional value to the best mutli-room 
sound system out there.
Brilliant concept. Especially for a big house.

Love the App!!! Now i could use the App to communicate /convey messages 
around the house....so convenience

Sonos = Great. Sonos + Sonofy = AWESOME! Significant extra value from 
something you already know and love. Only minor gripe is the courseness of 
the automated voice, though expect even that will improve in future 
versions.

Works well, use it to call the kids whennrhey have retreated to their 
rooms, lol. Thanks!
It's great...
Great app that works brilliantly.
Neat app for using my Sonos system

Sonos system is great. Sonofy makes it even better! App notications are 
very useful in some cases so that you wont miss an important message. It 
can also make you smart home even more so.

Really useful app for when you're playing your Sonos loud and don't hear 
that text or call coming in. Or to let the kids in the other room know that 
supper is ready.

This is a great app with lots of potential. Started using it as an intercom 
but it has a broader range of possibilities.
At last, I can interrupt the kids gaming with an 'it's dinner' call 😀

I was part of the beta and first of all was amazed that I finally found 
someone who had a desire to make this and not only was it great but it got 
better and I was actually able to provide feedback and send logs that 
allowed them to diagnose the issues I was having personally then they made 
a change within 30 minutes that fixed it I give it 5 Stars
Best thing yet for sonos, amazing!
Great app, perfect for rounding up the family!

Works seemlessly with my Play 5 Sonos. Definitely recommend to other Sonos 
owners!

This app helps me to put down my devices when I’m home.  Love having it announce my calls and text msgs.  Now I don’t have to go look at my phone every time it makes a notification sound. Sonofy just tells me it was a text, and who it’s from.  In another room and don’t hear that important sms? No worries.  And ‘unknown’ or ‘private’ calls won’t have me dashing for my phone to see who’s calling.   Great app.   Can’t wait to see where the developers go from here.
Great for getting the family together for dinner with the broadcast function

Excellent features and awesome support from the team. Everything just 
works, definitely worth it.

I hadn't used this app much because I was in a small apartment but we've 
just moved to our house and I'm excited to test out all the features!
Really useful for creating announcements and the broadcast feature is great

Sonos is a great set of speakers. This app complements it and makes it much 
better

Changes my Sonos system from a useful tool to an indispensable 
communication platform. Thumbs up!
Really awesome app that takes your Sonos system to the next level
Great app, use it to communicate with roommates across the house!

Love this app works well with my sonos speakers.. I love that they keep add 
features and they are quick to fix bugs.. keep up the great work
Great addition to Sonos!

I LOVE this app. I have a relatively big house (3 floors) with 2 kids and a wife that need corraling frequently. I have Sonos throughout the house and now, thanks to Sonofy, instead of yelling until my voice is hoarse, I press a button, gently speak my message ("dinner is ready", "come back downstairs and clean your dishes", "get in the car", "get in bed", "where are you?"). After just a few seconds' delay, my message is broadcast throughout the house.  Only minor con/PSA: I get annoying notifications (from Android system) that "Sonofy is using battery".  I have monitored it and it does not actually use much battery (less than 1% per day).  Did I mention that I LOVE this APP?

This app is actually really good - I used to use SonosAPI on a Raspberry 
Pi, but now I just have this in the corner on a tablet! Easy and wonderful!
Extremely useful for any Sonos user!
Extremely useful for any Sonos user!

I absolutely love this app. The ability to broadcast over SONOS speakers is 
simply an amazing feature. What a great idea. Has made my system even more 
useful.

I work as an on-call engineer from home but I also like to blast my music. 
Sonofy has been a game changer so I don't have to worry about keeping my 
phone on me every moment of the day!

This is a great way to turn your Sonos system into a broadcasting system! I 
use it to call my kids for dinner all the time.
Useful function and awesome for announcements.

Great app to use for broadcasting of voices and message in the house for 
these with sonos systems!

Very cool functionality. Really useful for announcements, but also very 
clever notifications!
